price: 197. Jouissance éphémère ! Puis leur abri sera la Géhenne. Quel misérable séjour !
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
